actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative Chandler of Washington to the Committee on Education and Labor, and Representative Vucanovich of Nevada to the Committee on House Administration.

summary.text: Elects the following Members to the specified committees: (1) Rod Chandler, of Washington, to the Committee on Education and Labor; and (2) Barbara Vucanovich, of Nevada, to the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative Chandler of Washington to the Committee on Education and Labor, and Representative Vucanovich of Nevada to the Committee on House Administration.
